entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:55 a.m. MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.0Â°C

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Blizzard and snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except east 80 gusting to 100 near the Richardson mountains early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Blizzard and snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h except east 40 gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains in the morning. Wind becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 31 March 2023
